item.title: On being trans
item.description: I am powerful, fierce, resourceful, creative, weird, caring. I am so much more and also none of that, in my own way. I take some time here to write about womxnhood and encourage everyone to actively challenge how we perceive it. Let the womxn in your life expand your definition of it. Itâ€™s been an incredible journey getting to know the trans womxn I am and coming to terms with how I want to live my life from this point forward.
